title: Kinesis Data Streams integration with Lambda which sends records to DynamoDB using the AWS CDK in Java
description: This pattern creates an Amazon Kinesis Data Stream and an AWS Lambda function which then sends the records to DynamoDB, using the AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) in Java.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: When data is sent to the Kinesis data stream, the Lambda function will be triggered which will then fetch the records from the event and send it to DynamoDB table.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
